API Reference

ImageText

class TextExtraction.ImageText[source]

Bases: object

extract_from_image(image_path)[source]

Extract text from an image file with line breaks preserved

filter_english_words(text)[source]

Filter text to include valid English words and proper nouns

process_image(image_path, output_path=None, filter_words=True)[source]

Process an image and convert to markdown

to_markdown(text, title='Extracted Text')[source]

Convert text to markdown format

PdfText

class TextExtraction.PdfText[source]

Bases: object

extract_from_pdf(pdf_path)[source]

Extract text from a PDF file preserving original line breaks

filter_english_words(text)[source]

Filter text to include valid English words and proper nouns while preserving line breaks

process_pdf(pdf_path, output_path=None, filter_words=True)[source]

Process a PDF and convert to markdown

to_markdown(text, title='Extracted Text')[source]

Convert text to markdown format while preserving line breaks

class TextExtraction.ScannedPdfText[source]

filter_english_words(text)[source]

Filter text to include valid English words and proper nouns

process_pdf(pdf_path, output_path=None, filter_words=True)[source]

Process a scanned PDF and convert to markdown
